attributes.action: ban the use of fireworks on Remembrance Sunday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a mark of respect to all the fallen soldiers in all conflicts we, the undersigned, ask the Prime Minister to ban the use of fireworks on Remembrance Sunday. This day along with Armistice Day should be set aside for a period of quiet reflection, remembrance and respect, not only for those who fell during the World Wars and subsequent conflicts but those still alive who remember the times in all their horrific details. Lest we forget ....
